snippet.title: Rex And The Time Machine [FULL GAME, ENGLISH SUBTITLES]
snippet.description:
Subtitles available now!

"Having defeated the evil wizard, Rex and Moles were finally going to rest. However, this was not given to them. Captured by the Order of Ricements, they spent the rest of their lives in the dungeons. Rex no longer experienced any adventures, and Moles never returned to his Molly ..."

If you don't want the story to unfold like this, help Rex rebuild the old sofa into a time machine and go sofa(r) into the distant past with it. Because this is where the only person who knows how to fix the history clock, change the course of events and straighten the meanders of time  lives. This person is the mysterious Nostradamus...

Who is Nostradamus and why is it so mysterious?

How did the funnels and time mounds appear and how do they work?

Are the dinosaurs really extinct? Or maybe they just went somewhere?

Who are the guardians of the secret mantra that holds the key to overcoming the Serpent Fissure in the Pyramid of Fear?

How to win a tournament being a dog?

What is the real story of the Mona Lisa's smile?

What numbers are worth betting in Big Lot?

You will know most of the answers by accompanying Rex and Moles The Mole in the next, already fourth, adventure-filled and unexpected trip ...
 
Information and interesting facts about the game: https://przygodyreksia.wikia.com/wiki/Reksio_i_Wehikuł_Czasu


English subtitles were made by:
1. Intro, Construction, Tunnel I - Kret Kretes Records
2. Prehistory - Nostradoktor, Kret Kretes Records
3. Tunnel II, Middle Ages - Ż. Art
4. Tunel III, The Future - OgnistyTV, Kret Kretes Records
5. Middle Ages - Rabarbark Fortress, da Vinci Cat, Tunnel IV - Xelo
6. Ancient Egypt and the Ending - mysliwy112

0:00 - Intro and Construction
25:36 - Tunnel I and Prehistory
59:05 - Tunnel II and Middle Ages I
1:32:47 - Tunnel III and the Future
1:50:53 - Tunnel IV and Middle Ages II
2:17:03 - Tunnel V and Ancient Egypt
2:32:06 - Tunnel VI, Medieval III, Tunnel VII, Future II and Outro


Useful links:
Kret Kretes Records on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KretKretesRecords
Official AoR forum: http://www.przygodyreksia.aidemmedia.pl/pliki/kretes/forum/reksioforum/
Adventures of Rex Hub: https://www.przygody-reksia.pl/
Site with all games available to download (all available languages): https://www.pobierzreksia.pl/
Reksio Discord: https://discord.gg/WKz6qwEzeX
Reksiopedia: https://przygodyreksia.fandom.com/wiki/Strona_g%C5%82%C3%B3wna



  The game was produced by Aidem Media
